needs: Uche seeks to enhance corporate legal functions by delivering measurable outcomes within constraints, optimizing contract processes, and improving governance through pragmatic, small-increment approaches. They focus on clarity in outcomes, early risk identification, and data-driven iteration, balancing part-time work demands with impactful contributions in M&A, regulatory, and negotiation domains.
personality: Uche communicates with empathy and clarity, adopting a coaching-led, collaborative style that values transparency and accountability. They prefer lightweight, accessible documentation and data-guided decision-making, emphasizing simplicity and continuous improvement. Their approach is pragmatic, iterative, and reliability-focused, fostering alignment and mentorship while translating complexity into actionable steps.
